title: Pookal Pookum Song Lyrics Madharasapattinam
stanzas:
Pookal Pookum Song Lyrics Madharasapattinam
@gvprakash #Harini #NaMuthukumar

Pookkal pookkum tharunam
aaruyire paarthaarum illaye
pularum kaalai pozhudhai
muzhumadhiyum pirindhu
povadhillaye

netru varai neram
poga villaiye.
unadharugil neram
podhavillaye

edhuvum pesa villaye
indru yeno edhuvum
thondravillaye
idhu edhuvo...

Iravum mudiyavillaiye
adhu mudinthaal
pagazhum mudiyavillaiye
poonthalirae...

Vaarthai thaevai illai
vazhum kaalam varai
paavai paarvai
mozhi paesume

netru thaevai illai
naalai thaevai illai
indru indha nodi
podhume

vaer indri vidhai indri
vin thoovum mazhai indri
idhu enna ivan thottam
poo pookudhe

vaalindru porindri
valikindra yutham indru
idhu enna ivan anbu
enai velludhe.

idhayam muzhudhum irukkum
indha thayakkam
engu kondu niruthum
idhai ariya engu
kidaikkum vizhakkam
adhu kidaithaal
solla vendum enakkum
munthalirae..

Oh!! Where
Would I Be?
Without This Joy
Inside Of Me?
It Makes Me Want
To Come Alive
It Makes Me Want To
Fly Into The Šky!

Oh Where Would I Be?
If I Didn’t Have You
Next To Me?
Oh Where Would I Be?
Oh Where, Oh Where?

Endha megam idhu
endhan vaasal vandhu
engum eera mazhai thoovudhe

endha uravu idhu
edhuvum puriyavillai
endra podhum idhu neeluthe

yaarendru ariyaama
paer kooda theriyaamal
ivanodhu oru sondham
uruvaanadhe

yaen endru kaetkaamal
thaduthalum nirkkaamal
ivan pogum vazhi engum
manam pogudhe

padhai mudintha piragum
indha ulagil payanam
mudivadhillaye

kaatril parandhe
paravai maraindha piragum
kilai thodangum
nadanum mudivathillaye
idhu edhuvo...

Pookkal pookkum tharunam
aadhavane paarthaarum illaiye
pularum kaalai pozhudhai
muzhumadhiyum pirindhu
povadhillaye

netru varai neram
poga villaiye.
unadharugil neram
podhavillaye

edhuvum pesa villaye
indru yeno edhuvum
thondravillaye
enna pudhumai..

Iravum mudiyavillaiye
adhu mudinthaal
pagazhum mudiyavillaiye
idhu edhuvo...
